name: Mixed Words English 2
description:
3 game modes:

- Find the fastest 20 selected words

- Find the most words in 3 minutes

- Series of the day: find quickly a series of 20 words (common to all players)

3 categories:

- 3300 English words

- 430 English verbs

- 100 animals

Work:

- Simply press the letters mixed in order to reconstruct the word, verb, or animal to recover.

Features:

- Use a wildcard when you block a word

- After 3 errors on a word, another word is selected (except for the series of the day)

- Share your best times online

- Check out the best times in each category

- Check out the best time of each game mode
